item.description:
*Meetup has been moved up to an hour due to me having the wrong start time initially. See you at 6:45!*

 

Kinda last minute, but I've been thinking about it for awhile. Sunday night trivia at Doherty's. Show us what you know while you enjoy some very tasty beers from  Doherty's huge tap/bottle selection.

 

Doherty's has a great trivia night with a big music round and picture round. The game starts closer to 7:30, but  6:45 is a good time to show up to get a good seat. We'll probably sit at some tables somewhere in the main bar/dining section (near the bathrooms if you haven't been there before).

 

Check people's pictures ahead of time to help try to identify the group.

 

See you there!
item.name: Trivia at Doherty's
